transcript.text: Trade restrictions can apply to the daily performance of your job, even while you are in the office. In this module, learn what you need to do to comply with our policies and the law when doing business globally.

panelText.text:
On completion of this module you will:
  • Understand how trade regulations affect your job duties and responsibilities.
  • Understand how to follow the relevant trade requirements.
  • Ensure you comply with our policies and the law.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
